fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: A boolean indicating whether or not the service encrypts the data as it is stored. Encryption at rest is enabled by default today and cannot be disabled.

fields.name: KeyType
fields.description: Encryption key type to be used for the encryption service. 'Account' key type implies that an account-scoped encryption key will be used. 'Service' key type implies that a default service key is used.

fields.name: LastEnabledTime
fields.description: Gets a rough estimate of the date/time when the encryption was last enabled by the user. Data is encrypted at rest by default today and cannot be disabled.
